Thank you. 3 THE WITNESS: Thank you, your Honor. 4 THE COURT: You may step down and out for the break. 5 Thank you. 6 THE WITNESS: Oh. 7 THE COURT: Everyone may be seated. 8 (Witness temporarily excused) 9 THE COURT: Does it need to be a sidebar? 10 MS. STERNHEIM: No, Judge. 11 THE COURT: Okay. Just a moment. 12 (Pause) 13 THE COURT: Okay. 14 MS. STERNHEIM: Your Honor, going forward -- 15 THE COURT: At the mic, please, Ms. Sternheim. 16 MS. STERNHEIM: I apologize. 17 I've just conferred with Ms. Comey, and I certainly understand her position, but it just seems to me that it's getting a bit out of hand with regard to the sealing of these exhibits. 18 Now, if the onus was on us, then we'll deal with it going forward, but we saw a 40-minute video, of which maybe 40 seconds -- 19 THE COURT: Well, I had a note to suggest there's no 20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012679
